summary: This is a brief email from a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney at the SDNY, sent on July 8, 2019, notifying recipients that Jeffrey Epstein's presentment proceeding has just started. It serves as a real-time update on the legal proceedings against Epstein.

persons.name: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, providing an update about Jeffrey Epstein's presentment proceeding from the United States Attorney's Office, SDNY.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email update; his presentment proceeding has just started, indicating a key legal step in his case.

connections.person1: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
connections.description: The Special Assistant is providing an update on Epstein's legal proceeding, indicating a prosecutorial role in the case.

events.title: Epstein's Presentment Proceeding
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's presentment proceeding has just started, as reported in an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office, SDNY.
personsInvolved: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney

keyFacts: On July 8, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein's presentment proceeding began.
The update was communicated via email by a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney at the SDNY.
This document indicates active federal prosecution of Epstein by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
